item.title: 中国向 WTO 提出钢铁诉讼加剧加拿大贸易争端
item.description: 中国加深了与加拿大的贸易争端，在对加拿大油菜籽征收新的关税几天后，又就钢铁进口限制问题向世界贸易组织提起诉讼。【原文：China deepened a trade spat with Canada, filing a lawsuit at the World Trade Organization over import restrictions on steel just days after slapping fresh duties on Canadian canola.】

item.title: 荷兰国际集团警告荷兰养老金改革将导致欧元汇率波动
item.description: 欧洲利率市场一角的波动性正在上升，从中可以窥见未来几个月荷兰养老金制度重大改革的潜在影响。【原文：Volatility in a corner of the European rates markets is on the rise, offering a glimpse into the potential impact of a major overhaul of the Dutch pension system in the coming months.】

item.title: Meta 的消费者人工智能应用在发布数月后仍存在缺陷
item.description:
Meta人工智能应用提供的体验参差不齐，与马克-扎克伯格高远的人工智能雄心形成了鲜明对比。【原文：

The Meta AI app offers an uneven experience, posing a sharp contrast to Mark Zuckerberg’s lofty artificial intelligence ambitions.

】

item.title: 乌克兰袭击俄罗斯炼油厂，特朗普和普京将会晤
item.description: 就在弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）准备于周五在阿拉斯加会晤，讨论可能的停火协议之际，乌克兰又袭击了一家俄罗斯炼油厂。【原文：Ukraine attacked another Russian refinery just as Vladimir Putin and Donald Trump are poised to meet in Alaska on Friday to discuss a potential ceasefire.】

item.title: 人工智能加剧科技股分化，小型股萎靡不振
item.description: 争夺人工智能财富所需的巨额支出拉大了大型和小型科技股之间的业绩差距。【原文：The massive outlays required to compete for artificial intelligence riches have widened the performance gap between large and small tech shares.】

item.title: 坐享巨大收益的 CoreWeave IPO 投资者有机会卖出
item.description: CoreWeave 公司 3 月份的首次公开募股对于有幸在一开始就参与其中的人来说取得了巨大成功。到 6 月中旬，股价上涨了四倍多。即使在最近的大跌之后，股价仍上涨了近 150%。【原文：CoreWeave Inc.’s March initial public offering has been a roaring success for anyone lucky enough to get in at the start. The stock more than quadrupled by mid-June. Even after a recent selloff, the shares are still up nearly 150%.】

item.title: 阿波罗欧洲信贷主管关注国防和人工智能领域的交易
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.）欧洲信贷联席主管特里斯特拉姆-利奇（Tristram Leach）在接受彭博电视采访时表示，该公司的目标是在欧洲投资人工智能、国防和基础设施，因为欧洲需要数万亿美元的支出。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is aiming to invest in artificial intelligence, defense and infrastructure in Europe, where trillions in spending is needed, its co-head of European credit Tristram Leach said in a Bloomberg TV interview.】

item.title: 美国银行哈特内特认为杰克逊霍尔会议后股市将出现获利回吐
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师表示，美股破纪录的涨势使其成为获利回吐的黄金地段，以防美联储在杰克逊霍尔经济研讨会上发出鸽派信号。【原文：The record-breaking rally in US stocks has left them prime for profit taking in the event of dovish signals from the Federal Reserve at the Jackson Hole economic symposium, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 九一集团的斯托福德称美国是市场风险的中心
item.description: 九一资产管理公司（Ninety One Asset Management）的约翰-斯托福德（John Stopford）正在削减股票和高风险债务的投资，认为自满的市场没有为唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策可能导致的美国资产大跌做好准备。【原文：Ninety One Asset Management’s John Stopford is trimming his exposure to stocks and riskier debt, arguing that complacent markets are failing to prepare for a potential selloff in US assets driven by President Donald Trump’s policies.】

item.title: Orsted 创纪录的最差一周暗示未来将出现更多波动
item.description: 自九年多前上市以来，风电先驱 Orsted A/S经历了跻身欧洲最有价值能源公司行列的高点，也经历了本周放弃上市以来所有股票涨幅的低点。【原文：Since its market debut more than nine years ago, wind power pioneer Orsted A/S has experienced the highs of ranking among Europe’s most valuable energy companies, and this week’s low of giving up all stock gains since going public.】

item.title: 买家回流，加拿大房屋销售连续第四个月增长
item.description: 加拿大房屋销售量连续第四个月增长，因为人们对加拿大经济能够抵御美国关税的信心不断增强，吸引了更多买家重返市场。【原文：Canadian home sales rose for a fourth straight month as growing confidence the economy will weather US tariffs draws more buyers back into the market.】

item.title: 印尼总统普拉博沃在吹捧社会开支的同时，将缩小赤字作为目标
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）在加强民粹主义福利措施并寻求从国家自然资源中榨取更多收入的同时，还致力于缩小预算赤字。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto is aiming to narrow the budget deficit even as as he ramps up populist welfare measures and seeks to squeeze more revenue from the country’s natural resources.】

item.title: Topix 创历史新高，GDP 增势强劲带动大盘股上涨
item.description: 由于经济扩张速度快于预期，日本股市本周第三次创下收盘纪录新高，其中金融股因日本央行加息预期重燃而领涨。【原文：Japanese equity benchmarks closed at a record high for a third time this week on faster-than-expected economic expansion, with financial shares leading gains on renewed expectations of a Bank of Japan rate hike.】

item.title: 贸易不确定性笼罩下的香港维持增长预测
item.description: 香港官员确认第二季度经济增长速度为 2023 年以来最快，并维持全年经济预期不变。【原文：Hong Kong officials confirmed growth expanded at the fastest pace since 2023 in the second quarter, and left the full-year economic forecast unchanged.】

item.title: 中国内地投资者购买港股数量创新高
item.description: 周五，中国内地交易员买入了价值 359 亿港元（46 亿美元）的香港上市股票，创下历史新高，因为现金充裕的投资者将目光转向了境外。【原文：Mainland Chinese traders bought a record HK$35.9 billion ($4.6 billion) worth of Hong Kong-listed stocks on Friday, as cash-rich investors turn their attention offshore.】

item.title: 特朗普与普京阿拉斯加会谈交易员指南
item.description: 在周五唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）会晤之前，交易员们正在整理他们的地缘政治游戏规则，寻找任何有关会晤结果将如何影响市场未来走向的迹象。【原文：Traders are dusting off their geopolitical playbooks ahead of Friday’s meeting between Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin, looking for any signs as to how the outcome will shape the future direction of markets.】

item.title: 潘多拉珠宝公司警告欧洲销售疲软，业绩下滑
item.description: 丹麦珠宝制造商潘多拉（Pandora A/S）警告欧洲需求疲软和关税不确定性后，其股价创下 4 月以来最大跌幅。【原文：Pandora A/S shares slumped the most since April after the Danish jewelry maker warned of weak demand in Europe and uncertainty over tariffs.】

item.title: 阿尔及利亚即将与埃克森和雪佛龙达成页岩气开发协议
item.description: 一位高级官员表示，阿尔及利亚即将与埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Algeria is close to finalizing a deal with Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. to tap the North African nation’s vast gas reserves, including shale, for the first time, a senior official said.】

item.description:

One of the most difficult times ever.

item.title: Centrica 与 Devon Energy 签订为期 10 年的美国天然气协议
item.description: Centrica Plc 签署了一项为期 10 年的协议，向 Devon Energy Corp. 购买天然气，以帮助扩大其在大西洋两岸的业务活动。【原文：Centrica Plc signed a 10-year agreement to buy natural gas from Devon Energy Corp. to help expand its activities across the Atlantic.】

item.title: 斯坎达-阿马尔纳特在《宏观此刻》节目中的更多内容（播客）
item.description: 现在，你可以提出一个很好的论点：通胀仍然过热，股市蓬勃发展，失业率为 4.2%，考虑降息是疯狂的。你也可以说，大部分地区的经济都在停滞不前，就业增长的步伐已经大幅放缓，而且房地产也在下滑，我们需要降低利率。在这种情况下，再加上我们的经济出现了诡异的分化，人工智能行业增长迅猛。【原文：Right now, you could make a good argument that inflation is still too hot, and that with the stock market booming, and the unemployment rate at 4.2%, that it’s crazy to think about cutting interest rates. You could also argue that much of the economy is stalling, that the pace of job growth has slowed dramatically, and that with housing in the tank, we need lower rates. Then on top of this situation, layer in the fact that we have this weird bifurcated economy, with the AI sector growing like ga】

item.title: 特朗普与普京会谈前欧洲天然气价格跌至 2025 年低点附近
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京举行历史性峰会之际，欧洲天然气价格下滑至接近今年最低水平。【原文：Europe’s natural gas prices slid to near the lowest level this year in anticipation of a historic summit between US President Donald Trump and Russia’s Vladimir Putin, which will seek to end a war that collapsed fuel flows from what was once the continent’s biggest supplier.】

item.title: 软银旗下 PayPay 向美国证券交易委员会提交美国存托凭证上市申请文件
item.description: 软银集团公司表示，其数字支付服务提供商 PayPay 公司已秘密向美国证券交易委员会提交了公开上市登记草案。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. said its digital payment service provider PayPay Corp. has confidentially submitted a draft registration to the US Securities and Exchange Commission for a public listing.】

item.title: 金斯米尔公司的所有者 AB 食品公司将收购英国面包业巨头霍维斯公司
item.description: 英国面包品牌金斯米（Kingsmill）的所有者英国联合食品公司（Associated British Foods Plc）同意从其私募股权支持者手中收购竞争对手霍维斯（Hovis）面包店。【原文：Associated British Foods Plc, owner of UK bread brand Kingsmill, agreed to buy rival baker Hovis from its private equity backer.】

item.title: 尼日利亚继承人力争石油产量翻番，瞄准非洲增长
item.description: 尼日利亚石油生产商 Heirs Energies 首席执行官 Osa Igiehon 表示，该公司计划到 2030 年将产量翻一番，并希望在整个非洲进行扩张。【原文：Nigerian oil producer Heirs Energies plans to double output by 2030 and is looking to expand across Africa, Chief Executive Officer Osa Igiehon said.】

item.title: 瑞士经济在 39% 关税打击前意外扩张
item.description: 瑞士经济在第二季度出人意料地实现了增长，在被美国征收最高关税之前保持了一定的增长势头。【原文：Switzerland’s economy unexpectedly grew in the second quarter, maintaining some momentum before the country was hit with one of the highest US tariff rates.】

item.title: 价格战对中国企业利润的打击证实了投资者的担忧
item.description: 中国两家重量级企业剑南春（JD.com Inc. ）和吉利汽车控股有限公司（Geely Automobile Holdings Ltd.）披露了残酷的价格竞争对其盈利的影响范围，投资者纷纷按下卖出键。【原文：Two of China’s corporate heavyweights JD.com Inc. and Geely Automobile Holdings Ltd. have revealed the scope of the earnings impact they’re having from brutal price competition, and investors are hitting the sell button.】

item.title: 普拉博沃表示有意打击印尼的非法采矿活动
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）在其首次国情咨文中表示，印尼将着手 "整顿 "非法矿山，据估计，这些非法矿山已造成 190 亿美元的国家损失。【原文：Indonesia will move to “rectify” illegal mines estimated to have caused $19 billion in state losses, President Prabowo Subianto said in his first State of the Nation address.】

item.title: True 新首席执行官为泰国电信领导者转移产品重点
item.description: True Corp.该公司新任首席执行官表示，True Corp.计划转向利润率更高的软件服务，以利用泰国最大的移动用户网络，该网络目前主要提供基本的电话和 WiFi 连接。【原文：True Corp. Pcl plans to shift into higher-margin software services to leverage Thailand’s largest mobile subscriber network that currently focuses on basic phone and WiFi connectivity, its new chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 新加坡丑闻后被判有罪的亿万富翁王永庆免于牢狱之灾
item.description: 被定罪的亿万富翁王明成（Ong Beng Seng）将免于在新加坡坐牢，尽管他卷入的丑闻震惊了这个以世界上最不腐败国家之一而闻名的城市国家。【原文：Convicted billionaire Ong Beng Seng will avoid jail in Singapore despite his involvement in a scandal that stunned a city-state known for being one of the world’s least corrupt nations.】
